NewsArticle.Title: Monk Forms validation technique improved
NewsArticle.Content: Nexon improved the validation for Monk Forms. This increases the stability of the Monk Forms(Draco, White Bat, Scorpion, and Kelberoth). Thank you for your reports. For more information on Monk Forms, check out this overview on them at http://www.darkages.com/webpages/community/lore/Randolf_Monastica.html
